content: **knitted jumper with round yoke for men in drops alpaca piece is knitted top down with english rib on yoke size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the clementin hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-890 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl 34 5/8 -38½ -41 -45 -49½ -54¼ **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 400-450-450-500-550-600 g colour 9020 light pearl grey **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm 20 stitches in width and 44 row vertically with english rib = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 80 cm for stocking stitch/english rib drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/219-6-clementin-hat
